sentences.en: But isn't the tariff an imposition on the farmer?
sentences.cn: 但是,关税不也是加在农民身上的一种负担 吗 ?

sentences.en: Everyone grumbled at the imposition of new taxes.
sentences.cn: 对征收新加的赋税人人都抱怨.

sentences.en: Expecting outrage and imposition, she was relieved to find she felt nothing.
sentences.cn: 她本以为会遇到粗暴强迫的举动, 现在觉得事情并非如此,倒松了口气.

sentences.en: I felt a flash of anger over the imposition on my privacy.
sentences.cn: 我因私生活受到干预,心头直冒怒火.

sentences.en: I know this is an imposition. But please hear me out.
sentences.cn: 我知道这是强人所难。但是请听我说完。

sentences.en: It would be an imposition on his good nature.
sentences.cn: 这在他的善良本性上是一次占便宜.

sentences.en: It's an imposition to ask us to stay late at work.
sentences.cn: 要求我们留下来超时工作,真是太过份了.

sentences.en: Other enterprise General is typing interpuntion, imposition, strips all doing, non - interference.
sentences.cn: 其他企业一般是打字排版 、 拼版 、 出片各干各的, 互不干涉.

sentences.en: Remember Bamiyan Buddha being razed to the ground , imposition of Jajia, force able conversions done by Aurangzeb.
sentences.cn: 记得被夷为平地的巴米扬大佛吗，还有对非穆征收人头税，奥朗则布强迫皈依…

sentences.en: The ego is a false imposition of the I. When you say I that is the eternal you.
sentences.cn: 小我是对“我”的错误强加。当你说“我”，指的是不朽的你。

sentences.en: The film star became wild with anger over the imposition on her privacy.
sentences.cn: 那位电影明星因私生活受到干预心头直冒怒火.

sentences.en: The imposition of a curved phase characteristic reduces the peak amplitude of the waveform.
sentences.cn: 曲线形相位特性减小了波形振幅峰值.

sentences.en: The main grievance of the drivers is the imposition of higher fees for driving licences.
sentences.cn: 让驾驶员深感不满的是驾驶执照收费的提高。

sentences.en: The rules of the game an arbitrary imposition of difficulty.
sentences.cn: 游戏规则让困难的得以强制执行.

sentences.en: The rules of the game are an arbitrary imposition of difficulty.
sentences.cn: 游戏的种种规则就是将困难武断地强加于人.

sentences.en: Would it be an imposition to ask that you come to the church to see me?
sentences.cn: 请您到教堂来找我行 吗 ?是不是太冒昧了?

sentences.en: Would it be an imposition to ask you to mail this parcel?
sentences.cn: 请你邮寄这个小包裹算是利用你 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 欺骗（impose的过去分词）；把…强加于
征收；强加；欺骗；不公平的负担

trans.tran_cn: 强加，被迫接受，过分的要求，税收
